non_lethal_events: {person} stalks distant footsteps but loses the trail.
{person} hides beneath branches as distant screams echo.
{person} drinks from a muddy stream and hopes it’s safe.
{person} accidentally gives away their position and quickly relocates.

non_lethal_events.text: {person} plots quietly with {ally} and {rival} deep into the night.
{person} negotiates an uneasy truce with {ally} while keeping an eye on {traitor}.

lethal_events: {killer} crushes {victim} with a boulder from above.
{killer} unleashes a swarm of tracker jackers on {victim}, killing them.
{killer} pushes {victim} into a pit of spike traps.
{killer} slams {victim} into a tree until the forest goes quiet.

lethal_events.text: {killer} launches explosives that wipe out {victim} and {victim2}.

inventory_events: {person} flashes a {item} to ward off pursuers.
{person} retools a {item} into something even more dangerous.
{person} cleans and maintains their {item}, preparing for nightfall.
loot_events: {person} scavenges a {item} from the Cornucopia wreckage.
{person} digs up a buried stash and pockets a {item}.
{person} slips a {item} into their pack unnoticed.
{person} opens a package from a sponser and recieves a {item}
{person} discovers a supply crate snagged in a treetop and retrieves a {item}.
{person} lifts a {item} from a careless tribute’s camp.
{person} follows a sponsor drone and steals a dropped {item}.
{person} finds a waterproof box with a {item} inside.

herb bundle: {person} kneels by a patch of greenery and comes away with a fragrant herb bundle.
{person} snips a handful of herbs and wraps them carefully for later.
Taco Bell Meal Deal: {person} finds a pristine Taco Bell Meal Deal still warm from the sponsors.
rubber chicken: {person} finds a rubber chicken and questions their luck.
poetry anthology: {person} is gifted a poetry anthology from their sponsor.

events: {person} fires a {item}, flooding the sky with light and drawing watchers.
{person} pops a {item} to blind anyone nearby and sprints for cover.
{person} spends the afternoon patching wounds with their {item}.

events.text: {person} rigs a {item} near the riverbank and waits for footsteps.
{person} repositions their {item}, tightening the perimeter.
{person}'s {item} snaps shut on {victim}, ending their run.
{victim} and {victim2} never see the {item} that {person} left behind.
{person} hurls a {item} straight into {victim}.
{person} stalks {victim} with a {item} and doesn't miss.
{person} fans blades so fast that {victim} and {victim2} both fall.
{person} shares their {item} with {victim}.
{person} attempts to murder {victim} with their {item} and fails.
{person} attempts to murder {victim} with their {item} and fails.
{person} attempts to murder {victim} with their {item} and fails.
{person} attempts to murder {victim} with their {item} and succedes.
{person} tends to their {item}.
{person} shoots {victim} with their {item}.
{person} rains arrows until {victim} and {victim2} both drop.
{person} overwhelms {victim} with the power of poetry, killing them.
{person} drops their anthology in the mud, ruining it

events: {person} escapes danger by swinging away with their {item}.

events.text: {person} drops onto {victim} from above using the {item}, killing them instantly.

events: {person} wraps their wounds tightly with the {item}.

events.text: {person} restrains {victim} with the {item} and finishes them off.

events: {person} starts a controlled fire with the {item}.

events.text: {person} sets a trap by lighting foliage, burning {victim} alive.
